4433.verse: وَأَن|And that|78|85|1470$لَّا|(do) not|75|88|30$تَعْلُواْ|exalt yourselves|127|140|13181$عَلَى|against|68|81|52$ٱللَّهِ‌ۖ|Allah.|56|69|606$إِنِّىٓ|Indeed, I|80|93|312$ءَاتِيكُم|[I] have come to you|162|169|11352$بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ|with an authority|134|372|9542$مُّبِينٍ|clear.|66|304|3469$

4434.verse: وَإِنِّى|And indeed, I|108|115|2795$عُذْتُ|[I] seek refuge|119|134|15125$بِرَبِّى|with my Lord|105|120|10782$وَرَبِّكُمْ|and your Lord|111|126|8552$أَن|lest|44|59|655$تَرْجُمُونِ|you stone me.|115|122|15588$

4444.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly,|112|135|640$نَجَّيْنَا|We saved|85|132|8559$بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٲٓءِيلَ|(the) Children of Israel|170|216|10567$مِنَ|from|50|96|156$ٱلْعَذَابِ|the punishment|122|145|482$ٱلْمُهِينِ|the humiliating,|121|121|14235$

4452.verse: وَمَا|And not|72|80|46$خَلَقْنَا|We created|97|112|7029$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|130|351$وَٱلْأَرْضَ|and the earth|111|126|2280$وَمَا|and whatever|111|126|46$بَيْنَهُمَا|(is) between them|142|150|3978$لَـٰعِبِينَ|(in) play.|80|80|11739$

4433.verse: And [saying], "Be not haughty with Allah. Indeed, I have come to you with clear authority.

4434.verse: And indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you stone me.

4435.verse: But if you do not believe me, then leave me alone."

4436.verse: And [finally] he called to his Lord that these were a criminal people.

4437.verse: [Allah said], "Then set out with My servants by night. Indeed, you are to be pursued.

4438.verse: And leave the sea in stillness. Indeed, they are an army to be drowned."

4439.verse: How much they left behind of gardens and springs

4441.verse: And comfort wherein they were amused.

4442.verse: Thus. And We caused to inherit it another people.

4443.verse: And the heaven and earth wept not for them, nor were they reprieved.

4444.verse: And We certainly saved the Children of Israel from the humiliating torment -

4445.verse: From Pharaoh. Indeed, he was a haughty one among the transgressors.

4446.verse: And We certainly chose them by knowledge over [all] the worlds.

4447.verse: And We gave them of signs that in which there was a clear trial.

4449.verse: "There is not but our first death, and we will not be resurrected.

4450.verse: Then bring [back] our forefathers, if you should be truthful."

4451.verse: Are they better or the people of Tubba' and those before them? We destroyed them, [for] indeed, they were criminals.

4452.verse: And We did not create the heavens and earth and that between them in play.

4453.verse: We did not create them except in truth, but most of them do not know.
